text.title: English Dream Interpretation Network
text.more: English dream keyword network. Nodes represents different dream symbols and edges are textual similarity between nodes. Different communities generated by Louvain method and each node has also sentiment scores computed from interpretation text.
text.intro:
English dream interpretation network. Nodes represents different dream symbols and edges are textual similarity between nodes.

For more information you can see our paper:

Connecting Dream Networks Across Cultures
ACM Library | ArXiv
